title: Teresa Giudice and family are planning on visiting husband Joe in Italy next month
text:
Her husband is currently in Italy awaiting the final legal decision on whether he will be deported.

And Teresa Giudice is bringing the rest of the family for a European reunion.

The 47-year-old reality star and their four daughters are set to visit Joe, also 47, in Italy in November according to their lawyer James J. Leonard.

The attorney appeared on SirusXM's Reality Checked with Amy Phillips when he said: 'Everybody is going over to see him. Teresa, the girls. That’s happening.'

Family first: Teresa Giudice and her four daughters are set to visit Joe, also 47, in Italy in November according to their lawyer James J. Leonard

Big reveal: Their lawyer James J. Leonard appeared on SirusXM's Reality Checked with Amy Phillips

The reality TV star couple have been married since 1999 and have four daughters - Gia, 18, Gabriella, 15, Milania, 14, and Audriana, 10.

As there have been rumors about Joe and Teresa's relationship being on the rocks, host Amy Phillips looked shocked as Leonard replied: 'Of course she’s going.

'Again, why wouldn’t she go? Joe is her husband … I would caution your listeners, everything you read and hear, take it all with a grain of salt. People typically don’t have the full story or an accurate story.'

Support system: Teresa with her attorney Leonard in New Jersey back in March 2016

The trip should not be seen as an entire Giudice family exile, however, as the attorney said the ultimate goal is still to bring Joe back to the US despite all the familial support in Europe.

Leonard said: 'Everybody’s goal is that he come back to the United States, and that’s what we’re working on.'

Teresa revealed the previous day that she and Joe will be appearing on a TV special together later this week which will be hosted by Andy Cohen.

The Real Housewives Of New Jersey Special Event: Joe And Teresa Unlocked is set to debut this Sunday at 8pm on Bravo which will be two weeks after Joe left for Italy after release from ICE custody.

Interesting: As there have been rumors about Joe and Teresa's relationship being on the rocks, host Amy Phillips looked shocked as Leonard replied: 'Of course she’s going'

It was confirmed by Leonard that Joe is currently with his brother and mother in Italy and that his sister-in-law is on the way there as he said the reality star comes from 'a very loving and supportive family.

'They absolutely adore him. There’s a lot of love in the Giudice family, and Teresa and the girls will be there in less than a month, so he’s certainly seeing everybody that he needs to see.'

Interesting: Teresa Giudice revealed that she and husband Joe (pictured together in September 2013) will be appearing on The Real Housewives Of New Jersey Special Event: Joe And Teresa Unlocked is set to debut this Sunday at 8pm on Bravo

'Tune in': The 47-year-old reality star took to her Twitter account on Monday to post about the joint interview with her husband, also 47, which will be hosted by Andy Cohen

The upcoming Bravo interview certainly seems to be shaping up as a must-see event as they will be discussing everything that has transpired in the last few years.

Teresa wrote: 'Joe and I will be sitting down with @Andy to discuss everything that has been happening with us and our family the past few months.

'Tune in to a special "The Real Housewives of New Jersey Special Event: Joe and Teresa Unlocked" airing Sunday at 8PM on @bravot #RHONJ'

In charge: Bravo boss Cohen, 51, will be mediating the conversation as Teresa said they will be discussing everything that has transpired in the last few years

Meanwhile, Joe was released from ICE custody and allowed to travel to Italy last week ahead of a final legal decision on whether he will be deported there.

Joe got the green light from a pair of judges a week prior to relocate to Italy as per his earlier petition, according to Us Weekly.

The Giudices' lawyer James T. Leonard argued in September that this move would allow Joe to begin earning a living for his family again, People reported.

'See you in a few weeks daddy': Teresa and Joe's eldest daughter Gia, 18, took to Instagram a week-and-a-half ago to share a snap of a slimmed-down Joe posing with his brother Pete

Joe was born in Saronno, Lombardy and has been in America since childhood but neglected to ever obtain U.S. citizenship, leaving him vulnerable to deportation after he and Teresa were convicted of various counts of fraud in 2014.

Both Joe and Teresa spent time in jail, serving back-to-back sentences so that one parent at a time could be home with the children.

Eldest daughter Gia took to Instagram a week-and-a-half ago to share a snap of a slimmed-down Joe posing with his brother Pete.

Sad: Joe and Teresa (seen together in March 2016) were convicted of various counts of fraud in 2014 and each spent time in jail, serving back-to-back sentences so that one parent at a time could be home with the children

She captioned the image: 'So happy your together right now.. enjoy see you in a few weeks daddy [two heart emojis]'

After his 36-month prison stint, Joe was transferred straight to the Clinton County Correctional Center in Pennsylvania and into the hands of ICE this March.

Joe's deportation was court ordered last October and his multiple appeal requests have so far fallen on deaf ears.

Teresa has been living it up despite the troubling time as she was seen at a Halloween party Thursday in Coconut Creek, Florida.

Queen: Teresa has been living it up despite the troubling time as she was seen at a Halloween party Thursday in Coconut Creek, Florida

Thigh's the limit! Channeling the HBO smash hit Game of Thrones, Teresa wore a leather mini-dress which featured a deep plunging neckline and some serious thigh splits

Channeling the HBO smash hit Game of Thrones, Teresa wore a leather mini-dress which featured a deep plunging neckline and some serious thigh splits to reveal plenty of the RHONJ star's flesh.

Her getup included a crown and a feathery cape - as well as a plunging neckline and some fishnet stockings to show off her svelte legs.

'Game of Thrones' began the mother-of-four's caption, which also included the hashtag '#halloweenparty'.

As Joe awaits a deportation decision, Giudice took comfort in her brother Joe Gorga and sister-in-law Melissa Gorga at the star-studded event.
description: The 47-year-old reality star and their four daughters are set to visit Joe, also 47, in Italy in November according to their lawyer James J. Leonard.
